review: I am very happy with the product.  It was easy to set up and start enjoying immediately.
author: Ray D. Turner

review: I use the stick for Amazon Prime video and Netflix.  Was easy to install and works as expected.
author: JMD Allentown, PA

review: Great! I love it! Easy to hook up.
author: Regena Jauregui

review: I have both the Fire TV and the Fire Stick. I love them both. I do wish the Fire Stick had voice search like the Fire TV.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Absolutely love it, I recommend it!! Very easy to navigate, very happy with it
author: Heather Ellis

review: I haven't seen any tv programs listed that I have ever heard of. And haven't really checked out much else.  I need to get AT&R; uverse  so it doesn't stop and start.  I had to have a friend come in and get it going.  We shall see.
author: Sharon Jarding

review: Love the UX of the menu. So easy to use and much better option than Chromecast (I have both).
author: APL418
